posts.post_title: WTB T202 Hassan Triple Folders - Graded or Raw
posts.post_content:
Interested in raw or graded T202s in any condition. Prefer to purchase in lots versus singles.
Please post pictures with price. Thanks.

Sent from my SM-N920R4 using Tapatalk

I have these two for sale or trade for "like players" in T206 form. :)
Speaker $300
Matty $625
or $900 for both.
